Articles.Content:
Howdy! The old post got eaten. I wanted to make sure it was available to those who want it.

The PDF guide: https://www.dropbox.com/s/g0bn6xeckjju1m8/kerbal%20guide%209%20Dec.pdf

The ship files: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9hskfom2aopvz6j/ships.zip

The Doc file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ekgwqi7mhumtzix/kerbal%20guide%209Dec.doc

Youtube Video of Shipbuilding Mission:

I have grand plans to do videos of the other missions soon. If you have any questions at all, feel free to ask away!

The PDF (file 1) and the DOC file (file 3) are one and the same...

Thanks, I have been looking for this, only JUST found this sub-area.
some parts of this could be updated for .21, but that might almost want to be held until .22 given the radical changes coming (including some much overdue OPTIMI-FREAKING-ZATION!!!!).

Well if OP wants to actually update this, he better make a new thread about it. This one is outdated and links seem broken. You know what it means.

/thread
